translation.en: May I take your order, ma'am?
- Mm- hm. - And a salad, I think.
- Uh- huh. - He's not here yet?
I have a reservation under Grace.
translation.es: Tengo una reserva a nombre de Grace.

translation.en: Uh, really nice to meet you.
Ah, and it's nice to meet you.
Declared missing from a shipwrecked ocean liner,
translation.es: Te declararon desaparecido en un naufragio,

translation.en: only to return alive after five- and- a- half years on a desert island.
translation.es: y tras cinco años y medio en una isla desierta, estás vivo.

translation.en: Ever since I first read your story, I've been dying to turn it into a book.
translation.es: Desde que leí tu historia, me muero por escribir un libro.

translation.en: You're way more handsome in real life than in your pictures.
translation.es: Eres mucho más guapo en persona que en fotos.

translation.en: - You haven't had lunch yet, right? - Uh...
Um, not yet. That's good. I ordered ahead for us.
translation.es: - Aún no. - Qué bien. Yo ya pedí.

translation.en: Let's just cover the basics while we're waiting for our lunch to come.
translation.es: Cubramos lo básico mientras esperamos el almuerzo.

translation.en: Is it all right if I record?
How have you been since your return?
Adjusting to city life again has been a little rough.
translation.es: Adaptarme a vivir en la ciudad ha sido un poco duro.

translation.en: that you can't break from your life in the wild,
translation.es: ¿Te cuesta dejar algunos hábitos extraños entre la naturaleza?

translation.en: or running around town with only a spear and a loincloth?
translation.es: o correr por ahí en taparrabos y con una lanza?

translation.en: It's just it hasn't been easy being around this many people.
translation.es: Es que no ha sido fácil estar con tanta gente.

translation.en: Well, I really appreciate you doing this interview.
translation.es: Te agradezco por darme la entrevista.

translation.en: I had heard you were turning down everybody that asked for one.
translation.es: Oí que rechazabas a los que te pedían una.

translation.en: Well, I've been rather torn about that.
I've been worried that no one would believe what I've been through,
translation.es: Me preocupaba que nadie creyera lo que me ha pasado.

translation.en: But there are some remarkable little creatures
that the world should hear about.
But weren't you stranded on the island all alone?
translation.es: Pero ¿no estabas solo en la isla?

translation.en: I was alone, and yet I wasn't.
translation.es: Estaba solo, pero no del todo.

translation.en: - After the ship went down... - Hm?
I floated in a ducky tube until I spotted an island.
translation.es: floté en un patito hasta que vi una isla.

translation.en: it took five steps to walk from one end of it to the other.
translation.es: que con cinco pasos iba de un extremo al otro.

translation.en: And after six long months alone on the island,
translation.es: Y tras seis largos meses solo en la isla,

translation.en: The bugs couldn't be real, though.
translation.es: Los bichos no pueden ser reales.

translation.en: Truth is, I didn't believe it at first, either.
translation.es: Yo tampoco lo creía al principio,

translation.en: Being stranded on an island with weird little bugs like them.
translation.es: estar varado en una isla con bichos raros como esos.

translation.en: Oh, could you describe again how the bugs looked?
The red one who's always ticked off is Red.
translation.es: El rojo que está siempre enojado es Rojo.

translation.en: And the stretched- out long one's name is Yellow.
translation.es: Y el largo y estirado se llama Amarillo.

translation.en: - Yellow. - And together, I called them...
Uh, yes! There were two bugs, and he called them...
Yeah. A primitive one living in the jungle.
translation.es: Sí, uno primitivo que vive en la jungla,

translation.en: Like a cave bug or bug Tarzan.
translation.es: como un cavernícola o... ...un bicho Tarzán.

translation.en: After that, they were always together.
translation.es: Desde entonces, no se separaron más.

translation.en: - They were always... - Red had the biggest crush on her.
Turns out bugs are just like little slimy people.
translation.es: Los bichos son como personitas babosas.

translation.en: I see that you don't believe me either.
translation.es: Veo que tú tampoco me crees.

translation.en: Hey, I really don't not believe you.
Unexplainable stuff happens all the time in this world.
translation.es: En este mundo siempre pasan cosas inexplicables.

translation.en: Just the fact that you were stranded and came back is an incredible story.
translation.es: Que hayas estado varado y hayas vuelto es una historia increíble.

translation.en: Um, then it was you and these three bugs
stuck on the island together the whole time?
translation.es: en la isla todo el tiempo?

translation.en: Well, no. It wasn't just me and the bugs.
translation.es: No estábamos solo los bichos y yo.
Clara, haz una voltereta. Buena chica.

translation.en: Are you serious? A singing seal?
Yes. Whenever I heard Clara's song, I felt happy and warm.
translation.es: Sí, cuando escuchaba la canción de Clara, me sentía feliz y animado.

translation.en: Bugs that act like little people and a singing seal?
translation.es: ¿Bichos como personitas y una foca cantante?

translation.en: Does an alien visit the island in a UFO?
Ooh! I was a massive band geek.
translation.es: Yo era bueno para la música.

translation.en: We didn't hit it off at first. But I guess I owe him,
translation.es: No empezamos bien, pero estoy en deuda con él,

translation.en: because he helped me build the boat that got me home.
translation.es: me ayudó a hacer el bote para volver.

translation.en: Great! I'm very happy to hear that.
What kinds of things did you eat on the island to survive?
translation.es: ¿Qué comías en la isla para sobrevivir?

translation.en: I was hungry all the time.
- Huh? - Let me tell you something about fish.
translation.es: Te diré algo de los peces.

translation.en: They don't care if you caught them fair and square!
translation.es: ¡No les importa si los atrapaste justamente!

translation.en: Although, Larva helped expand my dinner menu.
translation.es: Aunque Larva ayudaron a ampliar mi menú.

translation.en: The savory aroma of seaweed enfolded my entire body.
translation.es: El sabroso aroma de las algas envolvió todo mi cuerpo.

translation.en: It was like waltzing with the waves.
And that ribbon of sweetness on top,
translation.es: Esa cinta de dulzura hace que mis sentidos

translation.en: is making all my senses do somersaults in sheer delight!
translation.es: Esa cinta de dulzura hace que mis sentidos den volteretas de placer.

translation.en: It's the island on a plate!
We're about to eat our entire island!
I am one with this fish.
Yes! Smack me with your life force!
But there's deeper flavor. True treasure!
translation.es: ¡Pero hay un sabor más profundo, un tesoro!

translation.en: Felt only in a humpback whale's bellybutton.
translation.es: ¡Está en el ombligo de la ballena jorobada!

translation.en: Dare I say, the entire earth is in my mouth, massaging my taste buds!
translation.es: ¡No, toda la Tierra está en mi boca atacando mis papilas gustativas!
...sabe a la avena de mi mamá.

translation.en: It's all right, my dear boy.
Mom, can I please have one more bowl?
Sounds gross, but it was so good.
Mister, your story's the funniest thing ever!
You know you're not supposed to bother the customers.
translation.es: sabes que no debes molestar a los clientes.

translation.en: - My daughter is very curious. - Hmm?
Uh, no, I'm fine with her hearing. - You? - Huh?
translation.es: No me molesta que escuche. ¿A ti?

translation.en: Mm, uh, all right, yeah! She's very welcome.
Well, shall we get back to it?
Can you tell us about Larva in greater detail?
Hmm. Well, uh... One minute, they're at each other's throats,
translation.es: Un momento se llevan como perro y gato,

translation.en: then, turn around, and they're risking their lives for each other.
translation.es: y luego arriesgan su vida el uno por el otro.

translation.en: How long has it been since I've had fish?
I've had enough of you brats! Go away!
Take that!  You guys ruin everything!
- Lucky me! - Here we go! Here we go!
Just let me grill my yummy fishy.
- All right, fish, where were we? -
Why are you doing this? Why? Why?
Oh, please don't let it go out!
Hold on, flame, here I come!
It's burning! I win! I win!
The life of a pollack fish.
After the narrow escape, the pollack's relief is short- lived
translation.es: Luego de escapar, el alivio del abadejo dura poco,

translation.en: for there are countless dangers that lurk in the ocean.
translation.es: innumerables peligros acechan en el océano.

translation.en: However, in the fierce struggle for survival with its natural enemies,
translation.es: Sin embargo, en su feroz lucha por sobrevivir,

translation.en: the pollack has become stronger and smarter.
translation.es: el abadejo se ha vuelto más listo y fuerte.

translation.en: Our pollack turns out to be a female.
translation.es: Nuestro abadejo resultó ser una hembra.

translation.en: With spawning season upon her, many males begin their overtures.
translation.es: Cerca de la temporada de desove, muchos machos la cortejan.

translation.en: The flashy movements of one male are eye- catching.
translation.es: Los movimientos de un macho son llamativos.
Así comienza su romance de abadejos.

translation.en: a hundred thousand to a million little fishy miracles.
And when the time comes, they will leave their parents' embrace
translation.es: Cuando llegue el momento, se irán de al lado de sus padres

translation.en: to start a new journey in the vast world.
translation.es: para empezar su viaje por el mundo.

translation.en: Like their parents, they must survive many hardships and seek out a partner,
translation.es: Ellos también deben superar muchas dificultades y buscar una pareja

translation.en: so that they may fill the world with little miracles of their very own.
translation.es: para llenar el mundo con sus propios milagros.

translation.en: The life of a pollack fish.
Those bugs are like a phoenix or something.
translation.es: Los bichos son como un fénix.

translation.en: Yes, they are. Those little boogers could survive any danger ever! Uh...
translation.es: Sí. Esos mocosos sobreviven a cualquier peligro.

translation.en: - Uh... - Chuck. Lots of people seem interested in this story of yours.
translation.es: Chuck, hay mucha gente interesada en tu historia.

translation.en: It's the first time that's happened.
translation.es: Es la primera vez que pasa.

translation.en: - Mister! - Huh? Please! Please keep telling us your story!
translation.es: Señor, ¡por favor, siga contándonos su historia!

translation.en: This is the best story I've heard in my 84 years on Earth.
translation.es: Es la mejor historia que he oído en mis 84 años en la Tierra.

translation.en: I'm dying to try some of that tasty bug cuisine.
translation.es: Muero por probar esa sabrosa cocina.

translation.en: Your lunch is on me, if you agree to tell us some more.
translation.es: Te invito el almuerzo, si nos cuentas algo más.

translation.en: Are you all right with them hearing the rest of the interview?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que escuchen el resto de la entrevista?

translation.en: I'm really touched you all wanna hear what I went through.
translation.es: Me conmueve que quieran saber lo que me pasó.

translation.en: If I'm honest here, this is hard to swallow.
translation.es: Para ser sincera, es difícil de creer.

translation.en: It sounds like a fantasy movie.
And you haven't heard the half of it.
translation.es: Y no has oído ni la mitad.

translation.en: I haven't even gotten to the crazy stuff.
translation.es: Aún no he llegado... ...a lo más loco.

translation.en: Huh? Why is it so cloudy today?
Ah, who cares? I've still got the best boat.
Did I ever tell you until college,
I was on the soccer team!
translation.es: estuve en el equipo de fútbol?

translation.en: It's all because of you, bugs!
- - It's all because of you, bugs!
Ah, this ends right now, you hear?
You're done living up to your name.
translation.es: ¡Ya no le harás honor a tu nombre,

translation.en: I can't wait to turn them into puddles of goo on the beach.
translation.es: No veo la hora de convertirlos en charcos de baba.

translation.en: - A bug! A bug is me! -
What have you done to me, you horrible nightmare?
Sorry, I pushed you so darn hard.
I'm a gross and revolting ugly bug.
translation.es: Soy un bicho asqueroso y repugnante.

translation.en: Chicken tried to eat me whole.
I just thought of them as dumb little awful bugs.
translation.es: Creía que eran unos bichos tontos.

translation.en: - - Huh? What? Sounds like... Oh, my!
Look. Yum, yum, yum! You know you want it!
Not now! Let go of me!
Please! That boat was my ticket back home!
translation.es: ¡Por favor! Ese barco era mi boleto de regreso.

translation.en: Of course, it was only a dream.
Why, you little rotten bugs! Think that's funny, do you?
I'm sorry for acting so mean.
After that stuff, I was able to understand them better.
translation.es: Después de eso, pude entenderlos mejor.

translation.en: Uh! It was a force of habit.
- I'm sorry! - All right. There, there.
So you're telling us you shared a bond with your bug buddies?
translation.es: ¿Nos dices que formaste un vínculo con los bichos?

translation.en: Yeah. But not just my bug buddies.
translation.es: Sí, pero no solo con los bichos.

translation.en: We were trying to survive together, after all.
- Oh! - Wendy, it's all right. Daddy's here, darling.
translation.es: Wendy, no pasa nada. Papá está aquí.

translation.en: Looks like we're in for some temperamental weather.
translation.es: Parece que tendremos un clima inestable.

translation.en: The weather on the island was absolutely cuckoo.
translation.es: ¡El clima en la isla era increíble!

translation.en: Either burning hot or freezing cold.
Freak tornadoes would rip up out of nowhere.
translation.es: Intensos tornados salían de la nada.

translation.en: Why have icebergs completely surrounded the island?
translation.es: ¿Por qué hay témpanos rodeando la isla?

translation.en: - - I'm not gonna be an icicle.
We have to burn everything we can.
There's nothing else to burn.  What do we do?
Is that the... eye of the storm?
The storm's eye is an actual eye?
- - Well, let's give it a poke.
This is pretty messed up right here.
We've got to put that big eye out!
- It's just so... freaky. - Mm- hm.
If I hadn't seen it with my own eyes, I wouldn't believe it myself.
translation.es: Si no lo hubiera visto con mis propios ojos, no lo creería.

translation.en: Any of them wear glasses, you think?

translation.es: Lo más raro que he oído.

translation.en: Um, so, then, tell us how you got off the island.
translation.es: Cuéntanos cómo saliste de la isla.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Tell us how you escaped! Yes, do that!
- Did you swim across the ocean? - Huh?
That's what I was thinking the whole time I was there.
translation.es: Es lo que pensaba todo el tiempo.

translation.en: But I failed to escape so many times.
- I don't even know how many rafts I made. - Hmm.
...something happened that meant we had to leave the island.
translation.es: pasó algo que nos obligó a irnos de la isla.

translation.en: How can we ever get across that?
Right. Come on.  It's live or die time.

translation.es: ...¡en el equipo de baile del caño!

translation.en: I guess this is how I'm going to die.
I'm gonna die for acting nice.
I'm such a dumb, dumb, stupid--
This is the end of it all.
To ending this after all the suffering.
I thought if I just got off the island, then I'd be fine.
translation.es: Pensé que si salía de la isla, estaría bien.

translation.en: God, are you gonna end me this way?
Where did all the flying fish come from?
You know, thank goodness you guys are here.
translation.es: Gracias a Dios que están aquí.

translation.en: Then I said farewell to everyone and I was alone.
translation.es: Luego me despedí de todos y me quedé solo.

translation.en: Uh, but still, you at least were able to return home safely.
translation.es: Pero, aun así, pudiste volver a casa sano y salvo.

translation.en: But I lost the family I found there.
translation.es: Sí, pero... ...perdí a mi familia de allí.

translation.en: I wonder if they're all all right.
I'm sure your little bug friends are safe and happy somewhere.
translation.es: Seguro sus amiguitos están seguros y felices en algún lado.

translation.en: You said yourself they never die.
- They're strong. - We're right, you know.
And they keep on smiling, no matter what.
translation.es: y siempre sonríen, pase lo que pase.

translation.en: Please tell us other adventures you had with Larva.
I'll tell you about the time me and Larva went shark fishing.
translation.es: Les contaré de cuando fuimos a pescar tiburones.

translation.en: We got stuck right in a big humpback whale's blowhole.
translation.es: ¡Nos atascamos en el espiráculo de una ballena jorobada!

translation.en: It's been great. Come back anytime.
Well, that was certainly something else.
- I don't remember having a nicer talk. - Uh...
translation.es: La charla más agradable que he tenido.

translation.en: Thanks very much for talking to me today.
I realized today it's not as important everyone believe me as I thought it was.
translation.es: Me di cuenta de que no es tan importante que todos me crean.

translation.en: As long as I still remember my friends, I'll remember it's all true.
translation.es: Mientras recuerde a mis amigos, sabré que es verdad.

translation.en: Whether people believe it all really happened,
translation.es: Que la gente crea que sucedió

translation.en: I finally truly feel like I've completely left the island behind.
translation.es: Al fin siento que dejé la isla atrás.

translation.en: Well, we're happy to have you back, Chuck.
translation.es: Nos alegra tenerte de vuelta, Chuck.

translation.en: I won't forget your help. Ever.
To be honest, when I first heard his story,
I thought he was a big, lying liar pants.
Even now, I'm still not sure I believe all of it.
translation.es: Aún no estoy segura de si creo todo.

translation.en: But I've written this book with the earnest hope
translation.es: Pero escribí este libro con la sincera esperanza

translation.en: that everyone will hear of his amazing experiences,
translation.es: de que todos conozcan sus increíbles experiencias

translation.en: and the special friends he made on the island.
translation.es: y los amigos especiales que hizo en la isla.

translation.en: And I hope people enjoy my writing too.
translation.es: Y espero que también disfruten de mi obra.

translation.en: Could it all be hooey in bunk?
Everyone who heard Chuck's brave, intense story,
translation.es: Quienes oyeron la gran historia de Chuck,

translation.en: - myself included... -  ...felt almost transported to the island themselves.
translation.es: incluida yo, se sintieron casi transportados a la isla.

translation.en: It was clearly real to Chuck.
- And frankly... - Huh? - - ...that's good enough for this writer.
translation.es: Y es lo suficientemente real para esta escritora.

translation.en: I hope it's real to all who read this book as well.
translation.es: Espero que lo sea para quienes lean este libro.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I just left.
Subtitle translation by Uei- sung Kim
